heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_abaddon
heroes.bio_loc:
魔霭圣池，一个处于原初群石的裂缝，从中带有先兆力量的蒸汽不断溢出，作为家族力量的源泉，已经惠及数个世代。在居住于洞穴中的魔霭家族，每个新生儿都会在暗黑迷雾中接受沐浴，经过这样的洗礼，他们与大陆的神秘力量获得了内在的联系。随着他们长大，内心坚信自己的使命是誓死保护世袭的传统和领域的风俗——实际上他们守护的不过就是圣池本身。而迷雾的作用原理尚不明朗。

当初生的亚巴顿沐浴在圣池中时，众人都表示事情并不对劲。孩子的双眼里闪耀出洞察之光，在场所有人都大吃一惊，神父们纷纷交头接耳。而他之后的成长道路与所有魔霭族裔的传人并无差别——为战争接受训练，在危机时刻需要他挺身而出，率领家族的军队守卫先祖的大陆。但是亚巴顿总是特立独行。其他人挥着武器训练时，他喜欢在迷雾前沉思。他饱吸从圣池中涌出的蒸汽，开始学习将自己的灵魂与家族深处流出的力量相融合；他变成了被暗黑迷雾笼罩的怪物。

魔霭家族怨气冲天——不论老小都谴责他对自己的责任视而不见。但是亚巴顿驾临战场时，不满全都烟消云散，他们目睹了迷雾的强大力量让他恣意挥洒着生杀大权，族内任何领主都是望尘莫及。
heroes.hype_loc: 敌之尖刀，我之伤药，亚巴顿无论受到何种袭击都能幸免于难。他随时准备奔入焦灼的战场中盾护盟友，向敌友释放疗己或伤人的缠绕。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 保护队友或自身不受到攻击

abilities.name: abaddon_death_coil
abilities.desc_loc: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.
abilities.lore_loc: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.
notes_loc: Abaddon can not kill himself with this skill.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Mist Coil to also deal attack damage and apply effects from items and abilities.

abilities.name: abaddon_aphotic_shield
abilities.desc_loc:
Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating an all damage barrier that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the barrier is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.
notes_loc: The max damage is always dealt whether the barrier is destroyed by expiring or absorbing damage.
The explosion does not damage units hidden by the fog of war.
facets_loc: Damage barrier amount increased, but no longer bursts upon expiration. %absorb_to_damage%%% of absorbed damage is dealt to nearby enemies. Increases cooldown.

abilities.name: abaddon_frostmourne
abilities.desc_loc: Abaddon strikes an enemy, affecting them by a chilling curse, slowing them, causing them to take damage over time, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost. Damage over time component to buildings is reduced by %tower_dps_pct%%%.
abilities.lore_loc: While the baptized draw strength from the Font, the gifts of Avernus are debilitating to the uninitiated.

abilities.name: abaddon_withering_mist
abilities.desc_loc: Damaging enemies applies the Withering Mist debuff for %duration%s. Affected enemies have their HP regeneration, healing, lifesteal and Spell lifesteal reduced by %heal_reduction_pct%%% if they are below %hp_threshold_pct%%% HP.

abilities.name: abaddon_borrowed_time
abilities.desc_loc:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below %hp_threshold%.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.
notes_loc: Borrowed Time can be manually activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.  The passive activation can still occur while silenced.
Aphotic Shield does not block any damage to Abaddon when Borrowed Time is active, allowing him to heal.
Break prevents Borrowed Time from automatically activating.
abilities.scepter_loc: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than %ally_threshold_scepter% damage while within Mist Coil's cast range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_abaddon_immolation
talents.desc_loc: Affects Abaddon and all enemies in a {s:bonus_immolate_aoe} AoE.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_abaddon_3
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_curse_attack_speed} Curse of Avernus Attack Speed Bonus

facets.description_loc: Units dying nearby Abaddon lower his cooldowns.
facets.name: abaddon_death_dude

facets.description_loc: Aphotic Shield absorbs more damage and reflects damage when received instead of exploding at the end.
facets.name: abaddon_mephitic_shroud

abilities.name: abaddon_the_quickening
abilities.desc_loc: Units dying nearby Abaddon lower his cooldowns.
notes_loc: Every time a unit dies within %radius% range of Abaddon, reduce all of his Cooldowns by %cooldown_reduction_creeps% seconds if they are a creep or %cooldown_reduction_heroes% seconds if they are a hero.

new_abilities.name: abaddon_withering_mist
new_abilities.desc_loc: Damaging enemies applies the Withering Mist debuff for %duration%s. Affected enemies have their HP regeneration, healing, lifesteal and Spell lifesteal reduced by %heal_reduction_pct%%% if they are below %hp_threshold_pct%%% HP.
